DataElement.preferredName: Patient Web Based Material Received Preference Method Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the patients preferred method type for receiving web-based material.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient World Wide Web Base Material Receive Preference Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol._The most important or necessary part of something._The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._To take, accept, or get something offered._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: World Wide Web Base Material Receive Preference Method
Property.preferredDefinition: A computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol.:The most important or necessary part of something.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.:To take, accept, or get something offered.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.:A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

Concepts.definition: A computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol.
The most important or necessary part of something.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Patient Web Based Material Received Preference Method Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: E-mail is short for "electronic mail" and refers to composing, sending, and receiving messages over electronic communication systems. Most e-mail systems use the Internet.

Concepts.definition: E-mail is short for "electronic mail" and refers to composing, sending, and receiving messages over electronic communication systems. Most e-mail systems use the Internet.

PermissibleValues.value: By electronic medical record, such as using a patient portal (MyChart)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An automated, on-line medical record containing clinical and demographic information about a patient that is available to providers, ancillary service departments, pharmacies, and others involved in patient treatment or care.

Concepts.definition: An automated, on-line medical record containing clinical and demographic information about a patient that is available to providers, ancillary service departments, pharmacies, and others involved in patient treatment or care.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.: The atomic unit of data transferred between systems. It comprises a group of segments in a defined sequence, each message has a message type that defines its purpose. (HL7)

Concepts.definition: The atomic unit of data transferred between systems. It comprises a group of segments in a defined sequence, each message has a message type that defines its purpose. (HL7)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
